summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear addressed on the frontend by centralizing gallery image asset paths to static /assets/generated/* files and adding an image error-handling fallback component used for both thumbnails and the lightbox. No diff evidence shows investigation or fixes for the build/deployment configuration error (REQ-3). Additionally, the diff summary indicates multiple unrelated UI/content/theme changes that were not requested as part of the gallery/build fix.

missing_requirements.requirement: Investigate and fix the build/deployment configuration error so the app can build and deploy successfully without requiring manual intervention from the Caffeine team.
missing_requirements.reason: The provided diff summary only shows gallery asset/path handling and UI changes; it does not show any changes to build/deployment configuration files or tooling that would resolve the reported configuration error.

hallucinated_features.description: Broader branding/theme and site-wide UI/SEO updates (colors, shadows, SEO meta tags, header/footer styling, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is limited to fixing gallery image rendering/reliability and a build/deployment configuration error; it explicitly lists non-goals as avoiding new features beyond fixing visibility/reliability. The diff summary text indicates additional design/SEO/site-wide refinements not requested.
